thread.title: 26. The Continuous Evilution of Life's ?'s - Twiztid
thread.title_full: 26. The Continuous Evilution of Life's ?'s - Twiztid

title: 26. The Continuous Evilution of Life's ?'s - Twiztid
text: Twiztid just keeps getting better by SicJuggalo Since Twiztid left the Hatchet..and Formed Majik Ninja Ent. They have been on the rise..every song every ablum just keeps getting sicker Whoop whoop my Fam, My Ninja's, Lo's & Lette'salike MAJIK MAJIK NINJA What I already have 4 of the tracks when there's only 2 so far by TheMonsterInTheMirror I can tell it's going to be a good album. I got the VIP version of Psychomania off of there Juggalo Invasion Tour, Are You Insane Like Me? when they rereleased The Green Book, Nothing To You off of the from The VIP "exclusive" MNE 2016 Fall Sampler, and Kill Somebody when I preordered this album off of their official store. Based on the 1/4 of the album I've already heard, this is going to be a dope album. Don't sleep on it, get it now! Whoop Whoop! Perfect!
